version_description:
- Improved page conversion speed when compressing file image viewer (3)
- Improved font size, font spacing, left and right margin pop-ups in iOS 10
- Indent, underline transparency support in iOS 10
- Fixed a bug that the automatic scroll (page turn) function did not work on iOS 10
- Improved symptoms of slow loading and transitions on text file viewer screen in iOS 10
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Support image compression file bmp, tif, tiff extension image
- Improved the problem of encoding some lost (damaged) text files. (Symptoms displayed as strange characters)
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Add Image / PDF "Fit Width" option: In horizontal rotation, align image width with screen width. (First install is set to ON, update users can change in settings, iPhone app only)
- Text: Add night mode shortcut button (Center tab menu of viewer screen)
- Image/PDF: Add color reversal shortcut button (Viewer screen center tab menu)
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Improved text file encoding
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Improved text file rendering
- Fixed dying when restarting app on 1T storage iPad Pro device
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Speed up the appearance of the next page when scrolling text files (blinking symptom improvement)
- Symptom blinking when there is no animation effect when switching to text file tab page

- Image / PDF: Pagination related crash improvements
- Text file: speed up conversion of font / line feed information
- Other bug fixes and improvements
- Image / PDF: Improved the symptom of app dying in compressed file on next page automatic switching

- Paper texture background (text file) added. (Update users are enabled in the settings, the first install user is the default activation status.)
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- iPad multitasking function support
- The iPad app supports multitasking function, so rotation lock function is not supported.
- Simplified option to switch previous page with tabs
- Changed the previous page transition (tab) option so that only one of top, left, or right can be selected
- Adjust the position of options in the settings
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Text: Fixed single tab (next page) related bug
- Text: Improved the symptom that set animation effect does not apply when next page of Bluetooth keyboard is switched.
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Improved the symptom of moving to the first page when touching the status bar in a text file
- Improved various crashes reported.
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Ability to change text file page direction (swipe direction) and add option
- Text file If you change the orientation of two pages on the iPad, the page orientation changes as well.
- Added shortcut button to modify screen brightness
- Fixed a problem where decompression failed due to some image file name encoding problems when decompressing files.
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- The option "Single tab (next page)" is added to image / PDF.
- The "Single Tab (Next Page)" option on the Existing Text tab moves to the Common tab.
- Fixed the problem that the image enlargement and resolution are not same or smaller than the resolution of the device (PDF is not applicable)
- Fixed the symptom that the next page sorting option is not aligned to the previous page position when "None" is set.
- Added new "Center Up" sort option to next page sort option
- Text file: Fixed the problem that drag function does not work when "Single tab (next page)" option is switched OFF
- Improved downloading of cloud app files (importing files)
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Image / PDF: Added the ability to push backward one page in two page view
- Improved image / PDF two-page view
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- iCloud sync function added, change from setting to ON (iOS 11+)
- Synchronize the information (read location) of the file you read and open the same file on another device (logged into the same iCloud account) to view it again.
- Text Viewer app and Manga Viewer app can sync with iCloud: If you have the same iCloud account, you can sync your bookmarks with the history you read in the same file.
- Speed up the next page with tabs
- Other improvements and bug fixes
- 폰트 파일(ttf, otf) 등록 기능 추가 : 본인이 가지고 있는 여러가지 폰트 파일을 등록하고 사용할 수 있습니다.

- 미지원 파일도 파일 리스트 화면에 표시 됩니다.
- 폴더 압축 (Zip) 기능
- 폰트 파일 등록 버그 수정
- 기능 개선 및 버그 수정

- 암호 타입을 변경할 수 있습니다. (핀코드/지문/FaceID, 핀코드, 복잡한 암호)
- 모든 암호 타입은 기기의 암호 사용이 활성화 되어 있어야 합니다.
- 뷰어 화면에서 다음 파일을 선택할 수 있는 목록 화면을 표시할 수 있는 버튼 추가
- 최근 파일 내역 화면 하단에 파일 타입을 선택하고 분류되는 기능 추가
- 여러 파일을 한번에 삭제하거나 폴더를 삭제하는 경우 앱이 죽으면서 파일 삭제가 안되는 증상 개선
- 기타 버그 수정 및 기능 개선

- 탭으로 페이지 전환 시 딜레이 증상 개선
- 업데이트 후에 딜레이가 있다면 설정에서 더블탭 항목을 비활성화 해주세요.
- 더블탭 관련 기능 미지원 (메뉴표시, 줌인, 이전 페이지 전환)
- 더블탭 관련 기능 미지원 : 기존 사용중이면 비활성 전 까지 사용 가능
- 기타 기능 개선

- 메뉴 화면 상단에 현재 시간과 읽은 시간이 표시됩니다.
- "상태바 미표시 상태", "아이패드 멀티태스킹 상태", "노치 디자인 기기의 가로 회전 상태" 에서 표시 됩니다.
- "다음 책 전환" 옵션에 "미사용" 이 추가 됩니다.
- "다음 책 전환" - "미사용" : 마지막 페이지에 보이는 안내 화면과 목록 화면이 표시되지 않습니다.
- 기타 버그 수정 및 기능 개선

- Added the ability to play sound effects when changing the page transition animation to "Page Curl"
- If you are having symptoms of slow text file loading on newer OS version devices, please change the font to "Apple SD Gothic Neo".

- Improvement: The two-page option of the iPad text can also be changed in the options on the viewer screen.
- If the current version of iOS stops or slows down on the loading screen, please change to the default font "Apple SD Gothic Neo". (no symptoms on iOS 12)

- Improved to work according to the "Next roll" option when the last page is reached during automatic paging
- Image / PDF: Change "Swipe" option and "Swipe animation" option in viewer screen setting
- Other improvements and bug fixes
- If the current version of iOS stops or slows down on the loading screen, please change to the default font "Apple SD Gothic Neo". (no symptoms on iOS 12)

- Added two page view function only in landscape mode: It is a function that switches to one page mode when it rotates vertically in two page mode in horizontal rotation. (Text file viewer)
- You can change the double tap function again in Settings.
- If the current version of iOS stops or slows down on the loading screen, please change to the default font "Apple SD Gothic Neo". (no symptoms on iOS 12)

- RGB change function is added to color change.
- Drag the RGB color left or right or enter the number directly
- Change existing method and RGB change method to upper tab
- Improved the problem that background music can not be played while using the page turning sound.
- Add open cbz, cbr, cb7 files to other apps (cloud apps) with "Open as other apps" option

- Double tap once again to zoom out. (Image / PDF)
- Double tap - Added option to change the ratio of zoom in (image / PDF)
- Two pages - Move to previous position when switching to one page mode (image / PDF)
- In the iPad, when rotated horizontally to one page, an option to convert to two pages is added ("Two pages in landscape" item in option) (Image / PDF)
- Two-page mode - Improved the symptom of app dying sometimes when switching the page when the page push option is ON
- In color reversal, options are added so that the character color and background color from 0 to 2 become brighter (0 is the existing brightness)
-UI of the viewer screen (upper / lower bar and button) is always applied in dark mode (not displaying sky color, except background color)
- Image / PDF: Fixed bug where the image was not displayed when clicking the reverse color button after changing the animation effect or swipe settings

- Image: Improved crash symptoms during paging
-Text: Fixed the issue where two pages show the same content after returning from using another app in two page mode

- App display in "File"-"My iPhone (iPad)"
- Fixed bug that popup won't show up when downloading files from cloud app
- "My iPhone (iPad)" Sync: Some existing files / folders may not be displayed (on my iPhone (iPad) screen). Clearing and reinstalling the app will improve it.

- When you go to the home screen with the "App Lock" setting enabled, the last screen of the app is changed to lock (to cover the current screen).
- Option to define the behavior after clicking the compressed file
- You can check the file name of the image you are viewing by clicking the file name at the top of the image viewer of the compressed file / folder.
- Other bug fixes

- Improved the symptom of no file transfer when sharing file with other apps
- File sharing doesn't arrive when sharing files from other apps
- Added file sorting option. (Date modified, file size, progress)

- Added function to fix the rotation of all screens vertically (iPhone only)
- Font-line spacing improvement

- Download rar, 7z, cbz, cbr, cb7 files from cloud apps
- Improved text file scrolling (old devices)
- Automatic button position correction on 4.0 inch phones

- When installing for the first time, the symptom of not displaying the guide text on the main screen
- Increased cloud app download timeout time
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- "Recent List" and "File List" of main screen are separated.
- Both screens can be switched by swipe horizontally.
- Menu design of the viewer screen is changed.
- The change to the main screen removes the "Show recent files" option.
- Fixed a problem that can not download files from Mega Cloud
- Fixed anomalies at the top of the screen when running on the Notch Design
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Re-enabled "Show recent files" option in Settings.
- If the "Show recent files" option is turned OFF, only the file list screen is displayed without displaying the latest list screen. (main screen)
- Fixed the problem that the custom scroll bar is displayed on the right side of the recent list
- Fixed a problem that can not be changed when changing the dark mode after downloading a file from the cloud app (iOS 13)

- iOS 13 update improves crash on some devices
- Fixed the problem that the Recycle Bin screen does not apply to dark mode
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Added a function to delete only the item without deleting the original file from the recent list list (can be deleted from the right menu)
- Fixed the problem that the close search button is changed when the file is returned after executing the search
- Crash improvements on some devices in iOS 13
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Fixed the problem that the current page changes when the device is rotated in iPad multitasking with "two pages in landscape mode" mode enabled
- Improved reported crash on some devices since iOS 13

- Improved the symptom of app death when configuring files after app restart if registered through “Default font” of font list screen after adding external font file
- Change setting and sorting icon at the bottom of file list
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Imported font files (TTF, OTF) through "Cloud App"
- Add font file (TTF, OTF) file through "Open in other app" item in external app
- Folder check function added (file list screen)
- Improved to open the last viewed file regardless of the status of the recent file view option

- Apple pencil (2nd generation ~) double tap to add the next page switching function (ipad only, iOS 12.1 or later)
- Adjust the brightness of text and icons when setting the dark mode
- Change and improvement of time check API of automatic cache clearing
- Correct description text on desktop during first installation
- Added help function at the top left of the cloud app screen
- API improvements for text file conversion

- Swipe (drag) direction change also changes the direction of page movement of the left and right arrow keys on the Bluetooth keyboard.
-Improved image resizing for blurring of images with vertical lengths more than three times the length of the left and right (very long vertical images)
- Added a popup to display a guide when changing to some setting options

- Fixed an issue that prevented vertical images from displaying on some devices
- Add cloud app connection failure message popup
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Added image / PDF vertical scroll mode (= webtoon mode) function (iPhone iOS13 or later only / iPad not supported)
- Vertical scroll mode (= webtoon mode) : Zoom in and out, one page mode is fixed, some options are fixed and not applied.
- Improved the symptom of not being able to uncompress or open the compressed file because the free space of the device could not be accurately checked
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Fixed an issue where the last guide page was briefly displayed when switching pages during webtoon mode
- Added page initialization function = Initializes the page position the next time the file is opened again if it has progressed beyond the set progress
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Vertical scroll mode (= webtoon mode) zoom in function added
- Fixed the problem that the screen does not go down during cloud app function

- Fixed the problem of app dying when opening a file with very few pages in webtoon mode
- Added app language setting function independent of device language setting
- Option to change the maximum zoom-in value (Can be changed in the setting on the right side of the main screen)
- Webtoon mode: Added "Two pages", "Keep original" mode

- Fixed an issue where the app would die when automatically switching to the next book on the last page of some files in "Webtoon mode"
- "Swipe Back" function added , iOS 13+, Initial setting OFF, can be changed in setting
- Other improvements

- Fixed crash issue related to Apple Pencil support
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Added image fill function (supports iOS 13 or later) , Fill the screen with the current page.
- Swipe to close the screen: Added "Apply-2" option that works only when the menu of the viewer screen is displayed, and can reduce the malfunction of the page switching operation.
- Fixed the problem that the characters at the bottom of some pages of some text files are cut off by improving the left and right margins of the text.
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Fixed the problem that the page is not displayed when the vivid option is set to OFF in webtoon mode on some devices
- The status bar is always displayed at the top of the normal screen. (iOS 13+)
- Improved to change the value immediately when changing the screen brightness in the viewer screen menu
- Webtoon mode (vertical scrolling) support on iPad (in-app purchase or reward required, iOS13 +)
- Add recommended color

- Fixed an issue that caused empty gaps between images in webtoon mode
- Fixed a problem with the quality of PDF format webtoon files

- Improved last page screen
- Large / medium size thumbnail UI on recent list screen (iOS 13+)
- Can be changed through the button on the top left of the screen (iOS 13+)

- Optimize page spacing: Optimize the space between pages when scrolling text files (iPhone Only, iOS13 +)
- "Optimize Page Spacing" can be turned ON / OFF in the setting.
- Even in the "Optimize page spacing" function, some spacing may occur depending on the font and spacing settings.

- Text file: Improved page spacing
- Improved performance of "Handle blank lines / Remove line breaks"
- Improved not to repeat encoding when opening a text file (improvement of file open performance)
- Renamed "Center Tab" to "Horizontal Tab" among menu open options
- New "center tab" option to display when tapping the center center of the screen in the menu open function
- Improved scrolling performance of some files in webtoon mode

- Speed up loading text files
- Improved webtoon mode
- Improved the symptom of dropping when scrolling after changing font information (iPhone)

- Improved webtoons (scrolling symptoms)
- Fixed the issue that the bottom characters are truncated on pages of some text files after "optimizing text scrolling"
- Text file scrolling improvements
- Changed the maximum zoom in value from 10.0 to 30.0
- GZ (GZIP) compressed file support

- Text file TTS function support (in-app purchase or reward required, iOS13 +)
- Added full file search function in the main screen (Folder not supported)
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Added spacing option for text file underlining
- Option to change some of the file information displayed in the file list (no recent list screen)
- Fixed the problem that playback is not possible on a Bluetooth connected device after setting the setting to "Home Control"-"Apply" when playing TTS.
- Fixed the first TTS voice to be selected as normal voice quality (high quality voice needs to be downloaded from home screen settings)

- Fixed a bug where other types of files were opened when clicking [Open next file] on the last page.
- Added the ability to separate pages on two pages of iPad text, the options are the same as those provided by underscore (iOS 13+)
- Add voice download route in TTS voice selection popup
- Added instructions on how to improve on cloud app download failure popup

- TTS home control function not supported, TTS home control function is not supported due to interference with other functions provided by the app.
- Fixed the problem that decompression fails due to filename encoding problem
- Fixed to use [Two pages in landscape mode] function of image / PDF file in iPhone app (previously available only in iPad app)

- ePub novel support: Displays text and images on ePub and can be viewed in the same function (with the same function) as the existing txt file. (No media such as video or audio, no chapter function)
- Fixed the problem that the app sometimes stops or dies on the last page of the TTS function

- "Complex Password" doesn't work on iOS 13+
- After updating, change the "Complex Password" setting to another type and change it back to "Complex Password". After that, it works normally.
- Enable indentation option in all languages (txt, epub)
- Change initial value of blank line removal option (txt, epub)
- Added "sponsor" feature
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- txt file: Added the [Read inheritance] function and option to inherit the information of the existing file if there is a file with the same name when moving / renaming
- When saving to Photos from some image files, success popup is displayed but the images are not saved to Photos.

- Added a button to change single tap (previous page) option to viewer screen menu
- Improved the problem of overlapping buttons at the top left on the first launch
- Improved the overall file search speed on the main screen
- Thumbnail speed improvement and display method change
- Other function improvements and bug fixes
- Some ePub files could not be opened.
- Fixed an issue with the order of images when viewing a compressed file containing multiple folders

- Added FTP file sorting function and options
- Added the ability to download all files currently visible on the FTP screen
- Display size and modification date information under FTP file name
- Other function improvements

- Fixed the problem that the app does not run on devices with iOS 10 or lower
- Fixed the problem that the cell is not clicked when clicking the file icon in FTP

- Fixed the problem that the app dies when the image contained in the compressed file is large
- Corrected the cause of crash when rotating

- Improved file sorting function
-Other function improvements and bug fixes

- Added "None" option and function for image swipe animation effect
- Added a function to sort (thumbnail) by compressed file / folder group in the recent list
- Fixed an issue where the image gradually went down when switching from iPad to tab
- Fixed the symptom that the zoom-in hold state is reset when switching to the next page after tapping on the iPad
- Other function improvements and bug fixes

- Added support for Google Drive and Dropbox
- Fixed the problem of app dying when some ePub files are opened
- Fixed the symptom that thumbnails of other files are displayed. (Files showing thumbnails of other files are corrected when opened.)
- Other function improvements and bug fixes

- FTP: UI / UX change
- OneDrive, WebDav, SMB support (iOS 13 +)
- Other bug fixes
- Fixed the problem that the app dies when an error file is downloaded from Google Drive (API)

- Added "External Document" function (You can import files from other apps, + iOS13)
- Added a button to change the scrolling and paging in the text auto-scroll pause menu screen
- Other function improvements and bug fixes

- Fixed an issue that external keyboard input was not input normally on devices with iOS 13.4 or later (Emergency)
- Add notification message when inbox folder deletion fails

- Bug fix in webtoon mode
- Speed improvement when switching between one and two pages during rotation (when there are many image files)
- Improved SMB function
- Fixed the problem that the screen freezes during the process of downloading all files in WebDav

- ZIP library error improvement (fix)
- Improved Google Drive (API) file download
- Depending on the Wi-Fi connection status and file size, the "Download all files" function in the cloud / server may be limited.
- Improvements and bug fixes

- Folder lock function added
- Application of download progress UI (some cloud / server)
- Other function improvements

- Webdav access method improvement
- Added txt/ePub text alignment "Justify" function and options
- Easy address input on the WIFI upload screen
- Fixed a problem that is not displayed in the file sharing app list
- Added function and options that are applied in black depending on the dark mode setting in the image/PDF background color option

- Changed the background color of the pop-up to gray to make it less glare in dark mode.
- Other function improvements
